name: v0.7.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Update minitest requirement from ~> 5.3, < 5.15 to ~> 5.3, < 5.16 by @dependabot in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/104
* Switch CI from Azure Pipelines to GitHub Actions by @tas50 in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/94
* run specs on ruby 3.1 by @kasif-adnan in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/105
* add linters and publish gem action by @kasif-adnan in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/106

## New Contributors
* @kasif-adnan made their first contribution in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/105

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/compare/v0.7.0...v0.7.1

name: v0.7.0
body:
## What's Changed
* error handling of undefined method [] for nil class error when creat… by @maxgronlund in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/103
* Add support for remote Hyper-V; Fix style by @tecracer-theinen in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/97

## New Contributors
* @maxgronlund made their first contribution in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/103
* @tecracer-theinen made their first contribution in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/97

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/compare/v0.6.0...v0.7.0

name: v0.6.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Optimize our requires by @tas50 in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/93
* Update github_changelog_generator requirement from 1.15.2 to 1.16.1 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/96
* Upgrade to GitHub-native Dependabot by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/99
* Update github_changelog_generator requirement from 1.16.1 to 1.16.2 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/98
* Update github_changelog_generator requirement from 1.16.2 to 1.16.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/101
* Support Test Kitchen 3 by @tas50 in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/102


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/compare/v0.5.5...v0.6.0

name: v0.5.5
body:
## What's Changed
* Update github_changelog_generator requirement from 1.15.0 to 1.15.2 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/89
* Add lib/** back to the gem by @btm in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/91

## New Contributors
* @btm made their first contribution in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/91

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/compare/v0.5.4...v0.5.5

name: v0.5.4
body:
## What's Changed
* Add `password` option for transport section by @jerryaldrichiii in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/74
* Update Readme for linux-cloud-tool requirement by @unv-annihilator in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/77
* Cleanup by @smurawski in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/78
* fix gemspec by @smurawski in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/79
* Update minitest requirement from ~> 5.3, < 5.11 to ~> 5.3, < 5.14 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/84
* Update github_changelog_generator requirement from 1.11.3 to 1.15.0 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/83
* Update minitest requirement from ~> 5.3, < 5.14 to ~> 5.3, < 5.15 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/85
* Switch from require to require_relative by @tas50 in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/86
* Added quotes around variable for Get-DefaultVMSwitch by @kdoores in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/60
* Fixed markdown lint warnings and updated lic date by @hman20ps in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/88

## New Contributors
* @jerryaldrichiii made their first contribution in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/74
* @unv-annihilator made their first contribution in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/77
* @hman20ps made their first contribution in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/pull/88

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-hyperv/compare/v0.5.3...v0.5.4
